articles.title: VIDEO | Prithvi Shaw and Wriddhiman Saha combine to 'shock' Wade with a bizarre no look run-out - SportsCafe
articles.description: Just as we thought there is nothing to smile for Indian supporters in what turned out to be a disastrous day as India ended their innings on 9/36, Saha sent back Wade in what was a freak dismissal. This was one of the highlights for both Saha and Shaw in the …
